title:
Police Seek Assistance in Locating Critical Missing - John Holiday
Hawkins
body:
Prince George’s County,Maryland…The Prince George’s County Police Department is seeking the public’sassistance in locating a critical missing male identified as 76 year-old JohnHoliday Hawkins. He was last seen yesterday evening at approximately 6:00 p.m.driving from his residence located in the 3400 block of 26 Avenuein Temple Hills.  Detectives learned Hawkins wastaking a family member to the Naylor Road Metro Station and was driving a 2005green Chrysler 300 with a Maryland tag of A056455.  He has not been seen or heard from since. Hawkins is a black male with a darkcomplexion.  He is approximately 5’9”tall and weighs about 300 pounds with gray hair.  He was last seen wearing a blue jean shirt andblack/white-checkered pants.  Hawkins suffersfrom diabetes and dementia and is in need of his medication. Anyone with information on the whereaboutsof John Holiday Hawkins is asked to call the Prince George's County PoliceDepartment’s District IV Investigative Section at (301) 749-4901.
